proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. SubnetsInGW.node_props P = NetModel_node_props P

definition "SubnetsInGW_eval G P = (wf_list_graph G \<and>
  sinvar G (SecurityInvariant.node_props SINVAR_SubnetsInGW.default_node_properties P))"

interpretation SubnetsInGW_impl:TopoS_List_Impl 
  where default_node_properties=SINVAR_SubnetsInGW.default_node_properties
  and sinvar_spec=SINVAR_SubnetsInGW.sinvar
  and sinvar_impl=sinvar
  and receiver_violation=SINVAR_SubnetsInGW.receiver_violation
  and offending_flows_impl=SubnetsInGW_offending_list
  and node_props_impl=NetModel_node_props
  and eval_impl=SubnetsInGW_eval

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. TopoS_List_Impl SINVAR_SubnetsInGW.default_node_properties
     SINVAR_SubnetsInGW.sinvar sinvar SINVAR_SubnetsInGW.receiver_violation
     SubnetsInGW_offending_list NetModel_node_props SubnetsInGW_eval

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (SecurityInvariant SINVAR_SubnetsInGW.sinvar
      SINVAR_SubnetsInGW.default_node_properties
      SINVAR_SubnetsInGW.receiver_violation \<and>
     (\<forall>G nP.
         wf_list_graph G \<longrightarrow>
         SINVAR_SubnetsInGW.sinvar (list_graph_to_graph G) nP =
         sinvar G nP)) \<and>
    (\<forall>G nP.
        wf_list_graph G \<longrightarrow>
        set_offending_flows (list_graph_to_graph G) nP =
        set ` set (SubnetsInGW_offending_list G nP)) \<and>
    (\<forall>P.
        SubnetsInGW.node_props_formaldef P = NetModel_node_props P) \<and>
    (\<forall>G P.
        (distinct (nodesL G) \<and>
         distinct (edgesL G) \<and>
         SubnetsInGW.eval (list_graph_to_graph G) P) =
        SubnetsInGW_eval G P)

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<forall>P.
       SubnetsInGW.node_props_formaldef P =
       (\<lambda>i.
           case node_properties P i of
           None \<Rightarrow> SINVAR_SubnetsInGW.default_node_properties
           | Some property \<Rightarrow> property)
 2. \<forall>G P.
       (distinct (nodesL G) \<and>
        distinct (edgesL G) \<and>
        SubnetsInGW.eval (list_graph_to_graph G) P) =
       SubnetsInGW_eval G P

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>G P.
       (distinct (nodesL G) \<and>
        distinct (edgesL G) \<and>
        SubnetsInGW.eval (list_graph_to_graph G) P) =
       (wf_list_graph G \<and> sinvar G (SubnetsInGW.node_props P))

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>G P.
       (wf_list_graph G \<and>
        (\<forall>x\<in>edges (list_graph_to_graph G).
            case x of
            (e1, e2) \<Rightarrow>
              allowed_subnet_flow
               (case node_properties P e1 of
                None \<Rightarrow>
                  SINVAR_SubnetsInGW.default_node_properties
                | Some property \<Rightarrow> property)
               (case node_properties P e2 of
                None \<Rightarrow>
                  SINVAR_SubnetsInGW.default_node_properties
                | Some property \<Rightarrow> property))) =
       (wf_list_graph G \<and>
        (\<forall>x\<in>set (edgesL G).
            case x of
            (e1, e2) \<Rightarrow>
              allowed_subnet_flow
               (case node_properties P e1 of
                None \<Rightarrow>
                  SINVAR_SubnetsInGW.default_node_properties
                | Some property \<Rightarrow> property)
               (case node_properties P e2 of
                None \<Rightarrow>
                  SINVAR_SubnetsInGW.default_node_properties
                | Some property \<Rightarrow> property)))

definition SINVAR_LIB_SubnetsInGW :: "('v::vertex, subnets) TopoS_packed" where
    "SINVAR_LIB_SubnetsInGW \<equiv> 
    \<lparr> nm_name = ''SubnetsInGW'', 
      nm_receiver_violation = SINVAR_SubnetsInGW.receiver_violation,
      nm_default = SINVAR_SubnetsInGW.default_node_properties, 
      nm_sinvar = sinvar,
      nm_offending_flows = SubnetsInGW_offending_list, 
      nm_node_props = NetModel_node_props,
      nm_eval = SubnetsInGW_eval
      \<rparr>"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. TopoS_modelLibrary SINVAR_LIB_SubnetsInGW SINVAR_SubnetsInGW.sinvar
